channel.title: 🏢 Viterbi Faculty of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Technion on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Viterbi Faculty of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Technion on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Equivariant Machine Learning on Graphs with Nonlinear Spectral Filters
item.description: Nonlinear spectral filters (NLSFs) enable fully equivariant graph neural networks, improving accuracy and generalization.
